zhcn_desc: 这些水晶拥有独特的属性，非常适合用来凝聚和集中激光束，同时也是制作大部分高级电子器材的关键材料。部分文化也视之为装饰物。
en_desc: These crystals have properties that make them extremely effective at focusing laser beams, and they are also a critical component in most advanced electronics. In addition, many cultures treasure them as decorations and adornments.
